ivardefs.name: allowed
ivardefs.desc: True if the prescriber allows a different drug to be dispensed from what was prescribed.

ivardefs.name: reason
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the reason for the substitution, or why substitution must or must not be performed.

properties.desc: Indicates whether or not substitution can or should be part of the dispense. In some cases substitution must happen, in other cases substitution must not happen. This block explains the prescriber's intent. If nothing is specified substitution may be done
